auth.loginError: Login failed. Please check your credentials.

validation.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.nameTooShort: Name must be at least 2 characters

moments.title: Title
moments.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this moment?

settings.languageNote: The app will update immediately after changing the language.
settings.confirmDeleteAccount: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.

errors.NETWORK_ERROR: Unable to connect. Please check your internet connection and try again.
errors.TIMEOUT: The request took too long. Please try again.
errors.NO_INTERNET: No internet connection. Please check your WiFi or mobile data.
errors.AUTH_INVALID_CREDENTIALS: Incorrect email or password. Please try again.
errors.AUTH_SESSION_EXPIRED: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
errors.AUTH_EMAIL_NOT_VERIFIED: Please verify your email address to continue.
errors.AUTH_ACCOUNT_DISABLED: Your account has been disabled. Please contact support.
errors.AUTH_TOO_MANY_ATTEMPTS: Too many login attempts. Please try again in a few minutes.
errors.VALIDATION_INVALID_EMAIL: Please enter a valid email address.
errors.VALIDATION_INVALID_PHONE: Please enter a valid phone number.
errors.VALIDATION_PASSWORD_TOO_SHORT: Password must be at least 8 characters.
errors.PAYMENT_FAILED: Payment failed. Please try again or use a different card.
errors.PAYMENT_CARD_DECLINED: Your card was declined. Please check your card details or use another card.
errors.PAYMENT_INSUFFICIENT_FUNDS: Insufficient funds. Please add money to your account or use a different card.
errors.PAYMENT_INVALID_CARD: Invalid card details. Please check and try again.
errors.PAYMENT_PROCESSING_ERROR: We couldn't process your payment. Please try again.
errors.UPLOAD_FILE_TOO_LARGE: File is too large. Maximum size is {{maxSize}}MB.
errors.UPLOAD_QUOTA_EXCEEDED: Storage limit reached. Please delete some files first.
errors.PERMISSION_CAMERA_DENIED: Camera access is required. Please enable it in Settings.
errors.PERMISSION_LOCATION_DENIED: Location access is required for this feature.
errors.PERMISSION_STORAGE_DENIED: Storage access is required to save photos.
errors.RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND: The requested item could not be found. It may have been deleted.
errors.RATE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED: Too many requests. Please wait a moment and try again.
errors.SERVER_ERROR: Something went wrong on our end. Please try again later.
errors.SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE: Service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again in a few minutes.
errors.MAINTENANCE_MODE: We're currently doing maintenance. We'll be back soon!
errors.UNKNOWN_ERROR: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.

recovery.tryAgain: Try again in a few moments
recovery.useAnotherCard: Try using a different payment method
recovery.reduceFileSize: Reduce file size or compress the image
recovery.waitAndRetry: Please wait a moment before trying again

offline.title: You're Offline
offline.message: No internet connection. Some features may be limited.
offline.queuedActions: {{count}} actions will sync when you're back online

page1.title: Welcome to TravelMatch
page1.description: Connect and support travelers on their unique journeys through verified, heartfelt gifts.

page2.title: Share Your Journey
page2.description: Create moments from your travels and receive gifts from supporters around the world.

page3.title: Build Trust Together
page3.description: Every verified moment strengthens our community. Your proof of experience matters.

page4.title: Start Your Adventure
page4.description: Join thousands of travelers connecting through meaningful gifts and authentic experiences.

onboarding.welcomeMessage: Connect with travelers and create unforgettable experiences
onboarding.step1Description: Browse unique travel experiences created by locals
onboarding.step2Description: Book moments and chat with hosts
onboarding.step3Description: Create your own moments and earn money
